name: Down The Rabbit Hole (itch) (Merxon22)
description:
Down the rabbit hole is a mobile game based on my previous game jam project - Drifty Raft. The game theme is based on the 2023 Lunar New Year - the year of Rabbit. Players will play as a rabbit and collect as many carrots as they can before getting caught by enemies. The game is downloadable as an APK file for Android phones. Please enjoy :)

“兔子洞与胡萝卜”这个手机游戏是基于我上一次game jam作品“老人与海”创作而来的。它用了2023年的兔年春节为背景：玩家需要扮演一只兔子，在收集胡萝卜的同时，还需要避开敌人的追击。这个游戏可以以APK的格式安装到安卓手机上，希望各位朋友喜欢！(ゝω・)
